title: (x) "About Feminism" sans on book cover - FF Bau {Jan E}
content:
Hello, can anyone help me, please? Its al little bit similar to futura, but it is not futura. Help, please!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BUCHKIKI.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140423175543/http:/typophile.com/files/BUCHKIKI.jpeg) | 96.79 KB |
author: knigge02

comments.content: It is indeed [FF Bau](http://web.archive.org/web/20140423175543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_bau/?sample_text=It%E2%80%99s%20Time%20for%20Action&sample_size=40), and a nice example at that. What is the source of this image?
